verbose_text: It has also been shown that the water soluble fraction of PL is able to suppress tumors either indirectly by enhancing the host 's immune system, or directly by inducing apoptosis in tumor cells XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: water soluble fraction of PL is able to suppress tumors either indirectly by enhancing the host's immune system, or directly by inducing apoptosis
